trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of action the user must take to activate an item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de ação que do utilizador tem de efetuar para ativar um item.

trans-unit.source: The Activation property allows you to specify how the user will activate an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ativação permite-lhe especificar a forma como o utilizador irá ativar um item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Activating an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> differs from just selecting an item.
trans-unit.target: Ativar um item num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>difere apenas selecionar um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When an item is activated, an action is typically performed in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando um item é ativado, uma ação normalmente é efetuada um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemActivate>

trans-unit.source: For example, when an item is activated you might open a file or display a dialog box that allows the item to be edited.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um item é activado poderá abrir um ficheiro ou apresentar uma caixa de diálogo que permite que o item a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an item is double-clicked by the user to activate it.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um item é duplo clique pelo utilizador para o ativar.

trans-unit.source: If the Activation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, clicking the item one time activates it.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de ativação estiver definida, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>clicando no item de uma vez ativa o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: Setting the Activation property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> differs from the standard double-click because the two clicks can have any duration between them.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade de ativação para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>difere de acordo com o padrão faça duplo clique porque dois cliques podem ter qualquer duração entre eles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the Activation property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a propriedade de ativação estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, editar etiqueta não será permitida independentemente do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"></xref> members.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation"> </xref> membros.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a etiqueta de um item é editada pelo utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The AfterLabelEdit event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: O evento AfterLabelEdit ocorre quando o utilizador termina a modificar o texto de um item.

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: A nova cadeia de que o utilizador tipos para o item é passada para o evento e o processador de eventos pode rejeitar a alteração.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: Se o processador de eventos rejeita a alteração, o texto é revertido para o texto que estava antes do utilizador iniciou o item a editar.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the AfterLabelEdit event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque o evento AfterLabelEdit ocorre antes de editar a etiqueta é consolidado, ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método um processador para este evento para ordenar o item com o valor original.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In order for the AfterLabelEdit event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para que seja gerado, o evento de AfterLabelEdit o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo deve ser definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> event to perform tasks before the user edits the text of an item.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>evento para executar tarefas antes do utilizador edita o texto de um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento de itens no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property only affects alignment when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de alinhamento afeta apenas o alinhamento quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has no effect with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can drag column headers to reorder columns in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode arrastar cabeçalhos de coluna para reordenar colunas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the value of the AllowColumnReorder property has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Definir o valor da propriedade AllowColumnReorder não tem qualquer efeito exceto se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to allow users to reposition columns in the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para permitir que os utilizadores reposicionar colunas no controlo em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: When the AllowColumnReorder property is set to `true`, users can position the columns in the control to display the item and its subitems in a way that meets their needs within your application.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade AllowColumnReorder está definida como `true`, os utilizadores podem posicionar as colunas no controlo para apresentar o item e o respetivos subitems de forma que satisfaça as suas necessidades na sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop column reordering is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a coluna de arrastar e largar reordenação é permitido. caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*> property.
trans-unit.target: Dispõe os itens no controlo quando são apresentadas como ícones com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>método só é útil quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method arranges the items based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>método dispõe os itens com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on a value that differs from that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer com que os itens a serem alinhadas com base num valor que difere do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade, utilize a outra versão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons with a specified alignment setting.
trans-unit.target: Dispõe os itens no controlo quando são apresentadas como ícones com uma definição de alinhamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeIcons method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: O método ArrangeIcons só é útil quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of the ArrangeIcons method arranges the icons in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment> value specified in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do método ArrangeIcons dispõe os ícones no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>com base no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment>o valor especificado no `value` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does not change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método não altera o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is used to arrange icons on the control using a different value than that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para dispor ícones no controlo utilizando um valor diferente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the ArrangeIcons method.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer com que os itens a serem alinhadas com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade, utilize a outra versão do método ArrangeIcons.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the value parameter is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado no value parâmetro não é um membro do enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether icons are automatically kept arranged.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se ícones automaticamente são mantidos ordenados de forma.

trans-unit.source: The AutoArrange property only arranges items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoArrange dispõe apenas itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To change the alignment of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o alinhamento de itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoArrange to ensure that all items in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are automatically arranged to avoid overlapping at run time.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar AutoArrange para se certificar de que todos os itens no seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo automaticamente são dispostos para evitar a sobreposição em tempo de execução.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if icons are automatically kept arranged and snapped to the grid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os ícones automaticamente são mantidos forma e ajustado a grelha; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the given column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona a largura da coluna especificada, conforme indicado pelo estilo de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método só é Efetivo uma vez a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>e contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>ter sido criada e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>as colunas e cabeçalhos de coluna estão preenchidas com itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless AutoResizeColumn is called again.
trans-unit.target: Se forem adicionados novos itens para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, as colunas não redimensionará a menos que AutoResizeColumn seja novamente chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da coluna para redimensionar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is greater than 0 when is -or- columnIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns set.
trans-unit.target: columnIndexé maior que 0 quando é - ou - columnIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de conjunto de colunas.

trans-unit.source: headerAutoResize is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: headerAutoResizeNão é um membro do enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the columns as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona a largura das colunas, conforme indicado pelo estilo de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Chamar este método só é Efetivo uma vez a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>e contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>ter sido criada e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>as colunas e cabeçalhos de coluna estão preenchidas com itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless AutoResizeColumns is called again.
trans-unit.target: Se forem adicionados novos itens para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, as colunas não redimensionará a menos que AutoResizeColumns seja novamente chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn*> is called with a value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"></xref> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> is not set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> é chamado com um valor diferente de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle"> </xref> quando <> </> *> não está definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the background.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do fundo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on the layout of the background image of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem qualquer efeito no esquema da imagem de fundo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, por isso não ser apresentado no designer ou por IntelliSense.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> should be tiled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> deve ser tiled.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundImageTiled property returns `false` if an image is not set.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade BackgroundImageTiled `false` se não for definida uma imagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the background image of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> should be tiled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a imagem de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> deve estar em mosaico; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador inicia a etiqueta de um item a editar.

trans-unit.source: The BeforeLabelEdit event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: O evento BeforeLabelEdit ocorre quando o utilizador começa a modificar o texto de um item.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text.
trans-unit.target: Se o processador de eventos cancelar este evento, o utilizador não é possível editar o texto.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para impedir que o utilizador editar itens específicos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the BeforeLabelEdit event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo está definido como `false`, o evento de BeforeLabelEdit não é gerado; todas as tentativas de utilizador para editar item etiquetas são automaticamente rejeitadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Prevents the control from drawing until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Impede o controlo de desenho até o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar vários itens para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(acedidos através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe adicionar uma matriz de itens à lista numa única operação.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> every time that an item is added.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens de um de cada um tempo utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>classe, pode utilizar o método BeginUpdate para impedir que o controlo de novo desenho a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>sempre que é adicionado um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Quando tiver concluído a tarefa de adicionar itens ao controlo, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>método para ativar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>para repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when lots of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Desta forma de adição de itens podem impedir flickered desenho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>quando muitos itens estão a ser adicionados ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If BeginUpdate is called more than once, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: Se BeginUpdate denomina-se mais do que uma vez, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>tem de ser um número equivalente de tempos de chamada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: Até que a última chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>não será repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to BeginUpdate have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Além disto, várias chamadas para BeginUpdate não tem qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do limite do controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use the BorderStyle property to change the border style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to match the border style settings of other controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade BorderStyle para alterar o estilo de limite de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para corresponder as definições de estilo do limite dos outros controlos no formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if none of the other controls on your form displays a border, you can set the BorderStyle property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> to match the other controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se nenhum dos outros controlos no seu formulário apresenta um limite, pode definir a propriedade BorderStyle é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>para corresponder os outros controlos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in virtual mode has changed, and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o conteúdo da área de apresentação para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> no modo virtual tiver sido alterada e o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> determina que é necessário um novo intervalo de itens.

trans-unit.source: This event only occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento ocorre apenas quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling this event allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in the cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: Este evento de processamento permite o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>atualizar as informações de item mantido na cache para que seja prontamente disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This can improve performance on large lists, or lists whose items are expensive to calculate.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode melhorar o desempenho em grandes listas ou listas cujos itens são dispendiosas calcular.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box appears next to each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é apresentada uma caixa de verificação junto a cada item no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxes property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de caixas de verificação permite-lhe apresentar uma caixa de verificação junto a cada item na lista.

trans-unit.source: This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que a aplicação apresentar uma lista de itens (e subitems se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como `View.Details`) que o utilizador pode seleccionar clicando a caixa de verificação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxes property offers a way to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without using the CTRL key.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de caixas de verificação oferece uma forma para selecionar vários itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo sem utilizar a tecla CTRL.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user.
trans-unit.target: Consoante a aplicação, utilizar as caixas de verificação para selecionar itens em vez do padrão de método de seleção de vários poderá mais fácil para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo está definido como `false`, ainda pode apresentar as caixas de verificação e fornecem vários de seleção de funcionalidades para o utilizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Esta funcionalidade pode ser útil se não pretender vários itens para ser selecionado ainda continua a pretender permitir que o utilizador selecionar múltiplos itens na lista para efetuar uma operação na sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar quando um item tiver verificado, crie um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: To get all the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Para obter todos os itens marcados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>propriedade para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>para o controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os índices de todos os itens marcados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> are displayed instead of the check box.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade, as imagens de posições de índice 0 e 1 no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>são apresentados em vez da caixa de verificação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
trans-unit.target: A imagem na posição de índice 0 é apresentada em vez da caixa de verificação desmarcada e a imagem na posição de índice 1 é apresentada em vez da caixa de verificação marcada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set this property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando definir esta propriedade para `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>

trans-unit.source: > > Check boxes are not displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: >> Caixas de verificação não são apresentados quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box appears next to each item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for apresentada uma caixa de verificação junto a cada item no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlar; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the indexes of the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os índices de itens atualmente marcados no controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedIndices property returns a collection that contains the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CheckedIndices devolve uma coleção que contenha as posições de índice no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>de todos os itens que são verificados no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular os itens na coleção, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the index positions of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender obter uma colecção de itens marcados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, em vez das posições de índice de itens que são verificados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> that contains the indexes of the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>que contém os índices de itens atualmente marcados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não existem itens atualmente são verificados, vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>é devolvido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os itens marcados atualmente no controlo.

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CheckedItems property returns a collection that contains all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CheckedItems devolve uma coleção que contém todos os itens que são verificados no controlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular os itens na coleção, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende obter de uma coleção das posições de índice dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>dos itens que são verificados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo, em vez dos itens que são verificados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> that contains the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>que contém os itens atualmente marcados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não existem itens atualmente são verificados, vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>é devolvido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes all items and columns from the control.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os itens e colunas de controlo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove all items and columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without having to call the individual `Clear` methods from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para remover todos os itens e colunas do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo sem ter de chamar o indivíduo `Clear` métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Clear method does not clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Limpar o método não limpa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>especificado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: To clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para limpar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador clica num cabeçalho de coluna do controlo de vista de lista.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnClick event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: O evento ColumnClick ocorre quando o utilizador clica em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna numa vista de detalhes dos itens de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ColumnClick event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: O evento ColumnClick normalmente é processado para ordenar os itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>utilizar a coluna clicked como a coluna para ordenar por.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a ordem de cabeçalho de coluna é alterada.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnReordered event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O evento ColumnReordered é um evento cancelable e podem ser cancelado ao processar o evento e definição de <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o evento foi cancelado, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>não será alterado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all column headers that appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todos os cabeçalhos de colunas que aparecem no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Columns property returns a collection that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de colunas devolve uma coleção que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objetos que são apresentados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects define the columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objetos de definem as colunas que são apresentadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Cada coluna é utilizada para apresentar informações de subitem para cada item na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como manipular os itens na coleção, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não tem quaisquer cabeçalhos de coluna especificados e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não apresentará quaisquer itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> that represents the column headers that appear when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>que representa os cabeçalhos de coluna são apresentados quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>propriedade está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the width of a column is successfully changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois da largura de uma coluna é alterada com êxito.

trans-unit.source: This event will not occur if the column width change is canceled in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging> event For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Este evento não ocorrerá se a alteração de largura de coluna é cancelada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>eventos para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the width of a column is changing.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a largura de uma coluna está a mudar.

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to check the new column width with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, and cancel the event if you choose by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento permite-lhe verificar a largura da coluna nova com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade e cancelar o evento se optar por definir a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A> method when the component is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A>método quando o componente já não é necessária.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method removes the component from its container (if the component has a site) and triggers the dispose event.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o componente do respectivo contentor (se o componente tenha um site) e aciona o evento de dispose.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este controlo deve redesenhar a superfície de utilização de uma memória intermédia secundária para reduzir ou impedir flicker.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a superfície do controlo deve ser desenhada utilizando a memória intermédia duplo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a ver os detalhes de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Este evento permite-lhe personalizar o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo utilizando o desenho de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: Este evento pode ocorrer para cada cabeçalho de coluna no controlo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho de proprietário, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>tópico de referência de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Este evento permite-lhe personalizar o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo utilizando o desenho de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o desenho de proprietário, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>tópico de referência de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DrawItem event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> item.
trans-unit.target: O evento DrawItem pode ocorrer para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> events also occur.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>também ocorrem eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the DrawItem event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, pode processar o evento de DrawItem para desenhar elementos comuns a todos os itens, tais como a imagem de fundo e processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>eventos para desenhar elementos para subitems individuais, tais como valores de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Também pode desenhar todos os itens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar utilizando apenas um dos dois eventos, embora possam ser menos conveniente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar cabeçalhos de coluna na vista de detalhes, tem de processar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the DrawItem event occurs without accompanying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a DrawItem event handler.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ocorre devido a um erro no controlo Win32 subjacente, sem que acompanha o evento de DrawItem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>eventos uma vez por linha na vista de detalhes, quando o ponteiro do rato se move sobre a linha, fazendo com que nada pintado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>processador de eventos para ser desenhado por um fundo personalizado desenhado um processador de eventos DrawItem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: See the example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o exemplo no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>tópico de referência para uma solução que invalida cada linha quando ocorre o evento extra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Uma solução alternativa é colocar todos os código desenho personalizado num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>processador de eventos e paint a imagem de fundo do item todo (incluindo subitems) apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor é 0.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a ver os detalhes de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> é desenhado e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Este evento permite-lhe personalizar o aspeto de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo utilizando o desenho de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o desenho de proprietário, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>tópico de referência de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Subitem informações normalmente aparecem na vista de mosaico, bem como ver os detalhes, mas na vista em mosaico, tem de ser desenhado num processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The DrawSubItem event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> subitem.
trans-unit.target: O evento DrawSubItem pode ocorrer para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>subitem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the DrawSubItem event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>eventos para desenhar elementos comuns a todos os subitens, tais como a imagem de fundo e processar o evento de DrawSubItem para desenhar elementos para subitems individuais, tais como valores de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Também pode desenhar todos os itens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar utilizando apenas um dos dois eventos, embora possam ser menos conveniente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar cabeçalhos de coluna na vista de detalhes, tem de processar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DrawSubItem event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > DrawSubItem o evento não ocorrer para qualquer subitems para que não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objeto tenha sido adicionado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o primeiro subitem de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto representa o próprio item principal e é apresentado na primeira coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Resumes drawing of the list view control after drawing is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Retoma de desenho da lista de ver controlo após desenho for suspenso devido a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: A forma preferencial para adicionar vários itens para uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>consiste em utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(acedidos através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe adicionar uma matriz de itens à lista numa única operação.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> each time an item is added.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se pretender adicionar os itens de um de cada um tempo utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>classe, pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>método para impedir que o controlo de novo desenho a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>sempre que é adicionado um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Depois de concluir a tarefa de adicionar itens ao controlo, chame o método de EndUpdate para ativar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>para repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when a large number of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: Desta forma de adição de itens podem impedir flickered desenho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>Quando um grande número de itens a serem adicionado ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> is called more than once, EndUpdate must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>denomina-se mais do que uma vez, EndUpdate tem de ser chamado um número equivalente de vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to EndUpdate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: Até que a última chamada para EndUpdate o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>não será repaint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Além disto, várias chamadas para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o item especificado está visível do controlo, deslocamento o conteúdo do controlo se necessário.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para se certificar de que um item específico está visível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When performing validation on the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can call the EnsureVisible method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to allow the user to perform changes on the item.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar a validação em itens de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, pode chamar o método EnsureVisible para se certificar de que um item que falhou a validação é apresentado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para permitir ao utilizador efetuar alterações no item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>
