trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over an item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o rato passa sobre um item.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém todos os itens no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> returned by this property, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of items.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>devolvido por esta propriedade, pode adicionar itens, remover itens e obtenha uma contagem de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the items in the collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as tarefas que podem ser efetuadas com os itens na coleção, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>Tópicos de referência de classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> that contains all the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>que contém todos os itens a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection state of an item changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o estado de seleção de um item é alterado.

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event will occur when the selection state of multiple items changes.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>evento irá ocorrer quando o estado de seleção de vários itens é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ItemSelectionChanged event occurs whether the item state changes from selected to deselected or deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: O evento ItemSelectionChanged ocorre se o estado do item é alterado de selecionado desmarcada ou desmarcada selecionado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the labels of items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode editar as etiquetas de itens no controlo.

trans-unit.source: When the LabelEdit property is set to `true`, the user is able to modify the text of an item by clicking the item text to select it and then clicking the item text again to put the label text into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade LabelEdit é definida como `true`, o utilizador é possível modificar o texto de um item ao clicar no texto do item para selecioná-lo e, em seguida, clicar no texto de item novamente para colocar o texto da etiqueta para o modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The user can then modify or replace the item's text label.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode, em seguida, modificar ou substitua a etiqueta de texto do item.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> events to perform tasks before and after the user edits an item's text.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit>eventos para executar tarefas antes e depois do utilizador edita o texto de um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AfterLabelEdit> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>

trans-unit.source: The text of subitems cannot be modified if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível modificar o texto do subitems se esta propriedade estiver definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: To change the text of subitems, you can display a dialog box to users when they double-click a subitem in the control.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o texto do subitems, pode apresentar uma caixa de diálogo aos utilizadores quando estes faça duplo clique num subitem no controlo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, label editing will not be allowed regardless of the value of the LabelEdit property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation>, editar etiqueta não será permitida independentemente do valor da propriedade LabelEdit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ItemActivation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can edit the labels of items at run time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode editar as etiquetas de itens em tempo de execução; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether item labels wrap when items are displayed in the control as icons.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as etiquetas do item moldam quando os itens são apresentados no controlo como ícones.

trans-unit.source: When the LabelWrap property is set to `true`, the item text is wrapped to the next line of text if needed.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade LabelWrap está definida como `true`, o texto do item da aplicação para a seguinte linha de texto se for necessário.

trans-unit.source: If the text is longer than two lines of text, the text is shortened.
trans-unit.target: Se o texto é maior do que duas linhas de texto, o texto é shortened.

trans-unit.source: If the user selects the item, all the item text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador seleciona o item, todo o texto do item é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: If the LabelWrap property is set to `false`, all item text is displayed on a single line.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade LabelWrap estiver definida como `false`, todo o texto de item é apresentado numa única linha.

trans-unit.source: The entire item text is displayed when the LabelWrap is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O texto do item todo é apresentado quando o LabelWrap está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property is only used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é apenas utilizado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if item labels wrap when items are displayed as icons; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as etiquetas do item moldam quando os itens são apresentados como ícones; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> to use when displaying items as large icons in the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> a utilizar ao apresentar itens como ícones grandes no controlo.

trans-unit.source: The LargeImageList property allows you to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object that contains icons to use when displaying items with large icons (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade LargeImageList permite-lhe especificar uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objeto que contém os ícones de utilizar ao visualizar itens de ícones grandes (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can accept any graphics format that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control supports when displaying icons.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo pode aceitar a quaisquer gráficos de formato que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>suporta o controlo quando se apresenta ícones.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is not limited to .ico files.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não está limitado aos ficheiros. ico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Once an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the LargeImageList property, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to the index position of the appropriate image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>está atribuído à propriedade LargeImageList, pode definir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para a posição de índice da imagem apropriada na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The size of the icons for the LargeImageList is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho dos ícones para o LargeImageList é especificado por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because only one index can be specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the LargeImageList and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties should have the same index positions for the images to display.
trans-unit.target: Porque apenas um índice pode ser especificado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objetos especificados no LargeImageList e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>Propriedades devem ter as mesmo posições de índice de imagens para apresentar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> is set to 0, the images to use for both small and large icons should be at the same index position in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects specified in the LargeImageList and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>está definido como 0, as imagens a utilizar para pequenos e grandes ícones devem estar na mesma posição de índice no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>objetos especificados no LargeImageList e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the images are specified with keys, you still need to place small and large versions of the image at the same index location in their respective image lists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando são especificadas as imagens com chaves, é preciso colocar pequenas e grandes versões da imagem na mesma localização do índice na sua lista de imagem respetiva.

trans-unit.source: When switching between views, the index location of the image in one list is used to locate the image in the other list, regardless of the key value specified.
trans-unit.target: Quando mudar entre vistas, a localização de índice da imagem na um lista é utilizada para localizar a imagem na lista outra, independentemente do valor de chave especificado.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to use when displaying items with small icons (all view modes other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>a utilizar ao apresentar itens com ícones pequenos (todos os modos de ver diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>), utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: If you want to use images to display item state, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender utilizar imagens para apresentar o estado do item, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the icons to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref> que contém os ícones para utilizar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>propriedade está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comparador de ordenação para o controlo.

trans-unit.source: The ListViewItemSorter property allows you to specify the object that performs the sorting of items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called or when items are added to the list.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ListViewItemSorter permite-lhe especificar o objeto que executa a ordenação dos itens um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>método é denominado ou quando os itens são adicionados à lista.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Note that items are not sorted automatically when their label text changes.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que itens não são automaticamente ordenados quando altera o respetivo texto da etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: The specified object must be an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface, which has a single method called <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto especificado tem de ser uma instância de uma classe que implementa a <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface, que tem um único método chamado <xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.Comparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide custom sorting, for example, when a column header is clicked in the details view.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para fornecer personalizado ordenação, por exemplo, quando se clica num cabeçalho de coluna na vista de detalhes.

trans-unit.source: To do this, create a class that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and provides a constructor that accepts the index of a column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, crie uma classe que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interface e fornece um construtor que aceite o índice de uma coluna para ordenar por.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: You can then implement a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event that creates an instance of this class using the index of the clicked column.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode implementar um processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>evento que cria uma instância desta classe com o índice da coluna clicked.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>

trans-unit.source: When you set the ListViewItemSorter property to the new instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is automatically sorted using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Quando definir a propriedade ListViewItemSorter para a nova instância, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo é automaticamente ordenado utilizando o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method use the same object.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas subsequentes para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>método utiliza o mesmo objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the value of the ListViewItemSorter property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando definir o valor da propriedade ListViewItemSorter, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>método denomina-se automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> that represents the sorting comparer for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>que representa o comparador de ordenação para o controlo.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a vários itens podem ser seleccionados.

trans-unit.source: When the MultiSelect property is set to `true`, multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade MultiSelect é está definida como `true`, podem ser selecionados vários itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To select multiple items, the user must hold down the CTRL key while clicking the items to select.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar vários itens, o utilizador tem mantenha premida a tecla CTRL ao clicar em itens para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: Consecutive items can be selected by clicking the first item to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last item to select.
trans-unit.target: É possível selecionar itens consecutivos clicando primeiro item para selecionar e, em seguida, ao premir a tecla SHIFT, clicando em último item para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: You can use the multiple selection feature to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and perform an operation on all the items selected.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a funcionalidade de seleção múltiplas para selecionar vários itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar e efetuar uma operação em todos os itens selecionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the user could select multiple items and then right-click a selected item to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks that can be performed on the selected items.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o utilizador pode selecionar vários itens e, em seguida, clique com botão direito um item selecionado para apresentar um menu de atalho que apresenta um conjunto de tarefas que podem ser efetuadas em itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar quais os itens selecionados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> property allows you to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> that contains a list of the selected items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>propriedade permite-lhe aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection>que contém uma lista dos itens selecionados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedListViewItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> instead of the items, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que as posições de índice <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>em vez dos itens, pode utilizar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>propriedade aceder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to allow multiple selections in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, yet still want to offer the user a way for multiple items to be chosen, you can display check boxes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se não quiser permitir que vários seleções no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, ainda continua a pretender oferecer ao utilizador uma forma de vários itens, ser escolhida, pode visualizar as caixas de verificação, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the control can be selected at one time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se vários itens no controlo podem ser selecionada em simultâneo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control is drawn by the operating system or by code that you provide.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo é desenhado pelo sistema operativo ou por código que fornecer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is normally drawn by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo normalmente é desenhado pelo sistema operativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In order to customize the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items, subitems, and column headers, set the OwnerDraw property to `true` and provide a handler for one or more of the following events: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar o aspeto da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>itens, subitems e cabeçalhos de coluna, defina a propriedade de OwnerDraw como `true` e fornecer um processador de um ou mais dos seguintes eventos: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This is called owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Isto denomina-se de desenho de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, all three events occur; otherwise, only the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, todos os três eventos ocorrem; caso contrário, apenas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Subitem informações normalmente aparecem na vista de mosaico, bem como ver os detalhes, mas na vista em mosaico, tem de ser desenhado num processador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>evento não ocorrer para qualquer subitems para que não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objeto tenha sido adicionado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o primeiro subitem de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto representa o próprio item principal e é apresentado na primeira coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: Na vista de detalhes, pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>eventos para desenhar elementos comuns a todos os subitens, tais como a imagem de fundo e processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>eventos para desenhar elementos para subitems individuais, tais como valores de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: Também pode desenhar todos os itens <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar utilizando apenas um dos dois eventos, embora possam ser menos conveniente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar cabeçalhos de coluna na vista de detalhes, tem de processar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para evitar problemas com gráficos flickering quando o proprietário de desenho, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo é desenhado por código que fornecem; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo é desenhado pelo sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: Forces a range of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Força uma gama de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objetos para ser redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The RedrawItems method can be used whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode or regular mode.
trans-unit.target: O método RedrawItems pode ser utilizado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>está no modo virtual ou no modo normal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method has been called prior to the call to RedrawItems, the redraw will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>método foi chamado antes da chamada para RedrawItems, o redesenhar não ocorrerá.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index for the first item in the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O índice do primeiro item no intervalo para ser redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: The index for the last item of the range to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: O índice para o último item do intervalo para ser redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to invalidate the range of items; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to invalidate and repaint the items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para invalidar o intervalo de itens; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> invalidar e repaint os itens.

trans-unit.source: startIndex or endIndex is less than 0, greater than or equal to the number of items in the or, if in virtual mode, greater than the value of .
trans-unit.target: startIndexou endIndex é inferior a 0, maior que ou igual ao número de itens a ou, se no modo virtual, superior ao valor de .

trans-unit.source: -or- The given startIndex is greater than the endIndex.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o determinado startIndex é superior aendIndex.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and requires a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> está no modo virtual e requer um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object is in virtual mode, it creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects dynamically instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>objeto está no modo virtual, cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objetos dinamicamente em vez de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the object must create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Este evento é desencadeado quando o objeto tem de criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A handler for this event should create the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> or retrieve it from the cache, and pass it back by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um processador para este evento, deve criar apropriados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>ou obtê-lo a partir da cache e transmiti-lo novamente ao way do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RetrieveVirtualItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo é apresentado da direita para a esquerda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> property is for use with international applications where the language is read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>propriedade é para utilização com aplicações internacionais onde o idioma é ler a partir da direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> to true the control's contents and text will be laid out from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Se definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>como verdadeiro conteúdo e o texto do controlo irá ser disposto da direita para a esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control is laid out from right to left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo é disposto partir da direita para esquerda; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
