trans-unit.source: For example, the View property is often set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> because the details view provides a number of viewing options not available in the other views.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a propriedade de vista é, muitas vezes, definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>porque a vista de detalhes fornece um número de visualização não está disponíveis nas vistas de outras opções.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não tem quaisquer cabeçalhos de coluna especificados e defina a propriedade de vista como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não apresentará quaisquer itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the View property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any subitems.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não tem quaisquer cabeçalhos de coluna especificados e defina a propriedade de vista como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo não apresentará quaisquer subitems.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view displays each item with a large icon on the left and textual information on the right.
trans-unit.target: A vista de mosaico apresenta cada item com um ícone grande nas informações esquerdas e textual à direita.

trans-unit.source: The textual information consists of the item label followed by subitems.
trans-unit.target: As informações textual é composta por da etiqueta do item seguida subitems.

trans-unit.source: By default, only the first subitem is displayed, which corresponds to the item label.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, é apresentada apenas a primeira subitem, que corresponde à etiqueta do item.

trans-unit.source: To display additional subitems, you must add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar subitems adicionais, tem de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>objetos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: Each subitem in the tile corresponds to a column header.
trans-unit.target: Cada subitem na peça de mosaico corresponde a um cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: To control which subitems are displayed and the order in which they are displayed, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each item and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for each header.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar os subitems são apresentados e a ordem em que são apresentadas, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para cada item e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para cada cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then add, remove, and rearrange headers in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection to achieve the desired result.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode adicionar, remover e reorganizar cabeçalhos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>coleção para alcançar o resultado desejado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: To control the size of the tiles in the tile view, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar o tamanho de mosaicos na vista de mosaico, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful to prevent line-wrapping when subitem text is too long for a single line.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil para evitar o encapsulamento de aplicações de linha quando subitem texto é demasiado extenso para uma única linha.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the tile view, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de vista de mosaico, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although columns are only displayed in the details view, subitems without column headers will not display in either the details view or the tile view.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora colunas apenas são apresentadas na vista de detalhes, subitems sem cabeçalhos de coluna não serão apresentadas na vista de detalhes ou a vista em mosaico.

trans-unit.source: The tile view is available only on Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A vista em mosaico só está disponível no Windows XP e Windows Server 2003 quando a aplicação chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On earlier operating systems, any code related to the tile view has no effect, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control displays in the large icon view.
trans-unit.target: Em sistemas operativos anteriores, qualquer código relacionado para a vista em mosaico não tem efeito e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo apresenta na vista de ícones grandes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: As a result, any code that depends on the tile view might not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, qualquer código que depende a vista em mosaico poderão não funcionar corretamente.

trans-unit.source: You might want to include code that determines whether tile view is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: Que pretende incluir o código que determina se a vista em mosaico está disponível e fornecer a funcionalidade alternativa quando não está disponível.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use owner drawing to customize the appearance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> items in the tile view, you might want to use drawing code appropriate to the large icon view when running on operating systems that do not support the tile view.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando utiliza o proprietário de desenho para personalizar o aspeto da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>itens na vista de mosaico, poderá querer utilizar código desenho adequado para a vista de ícones grandes durante a execução em sistemas operativos que não suportam a vista em mosaico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The tile view feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade de vista de mosaico é fornecida pela mesma biblioteca que fornece a funcionalidade de temas do sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: To check for the availability of this library, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> method overload and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Para verificar a disponibilidade desta biblioteca, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>sobrecarga de método e passar no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.Themes?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport.IsPresent%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.View"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and the selection state of a range of items has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> está no modo virtual e a seleção do Estado de um intervalo de itens é alterado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is not in virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>não está no modo virtual, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged>evento irá ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemSelectionChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the list when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objetos contidos numa lista no modo virtual.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting the VirtualListSize property when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> set to `false` will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir a propriedade VirtualListSize quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>definido como `false` não tem qualquer efeito no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is set to `true`, and the VirtualListSize property is greater than 0, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, providing a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>está definido como `true`e a propriedade VirtualListSize é maior que 0, deve processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>evento, fornecendo um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> válido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> when in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> objetos contidos no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> quando no modo virtual.

trans-unit.source: VirtualListSize is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: VirtualListSize está definido para um valor inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, VirtualListSize is greater than 0, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> is not handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, VirtualListSize é maior que 0, e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> não é processado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you have provided your own data-management operations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se forneceu as suas próprias operações de gestão de dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Setting the VirtualMode property to `true` puts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> into virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade VirtualMode como `true` coloca o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In Virtual mode, the normal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is unused.
trans-unit.target: No modo Virtual, o normal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>coleção é usada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects are created dynamically as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires them.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objetos são criados dinamicamente como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>necessitar deles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Virtual mode can be useful under many circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Modo virtual pode ser útil em muitos circunstâncias.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object must be populated from a very large collection already in memory, creating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object for each entry can be wasteful.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>objeto tem de ser preenchido de uma coleção muito grande já se encontra na memória, criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto para cada entrada pode ser wasteful.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the items required are created.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, apenas os itens necessários são criados.

trans-unit.source: In other cases, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects may need to be recalculated frequently, and doing this for the whole collection would produce unacceptable performance.
trans-unit.target: Noutros casos, os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objetos poderão ter de ser recalculada com frequência e fazê-lo para a coleção completa produziria o desempenho aceitável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, only the required items are calculated.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, apenas os itens requeridos são calculados.

trans-unit.source: In order to use virtual mode, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event, which is raised every time the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> requires an item.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar o modo virtual, tem de processar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>evento, o que é acionado sempre que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>necessita de um item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: This event handler should create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object that belongs at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos deve criar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto que pertence o índice especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A> property must be set to the size of the virtual list.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>propriedade deve ser definida para o tamanho da lista virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event enables searching in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>eventos permite procurar no modo virtual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem>

trans-unit.source: If this event is not handled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se este evento não é processado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A>métodos devolverá `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event in order to maintain a cache of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pode processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>eventos para manter uma cache de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>

trans-unit.source: If the calculation or lookup to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object is expensive, maintaining a cache can improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Se o cálculo ou de pesquisa para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>objeto é dispendioso, mantém uma cache pode melhorar o desempenho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, the value will automatically be changed to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> when VirtualMode is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>, o valor será alterado automaticamente para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>quando o VirtualMode está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: In virtual mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> collection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: No modo virtual, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>coleção está desativada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to access it results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: A tentar aceder ao mesmo resulta em <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The same is true of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo se aplica-se do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>coleção e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to retrieve the selected or checked items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> collections instead.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender obter os itens selecionados ou marcados, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>coleções em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> uses data-management operations that you provide; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> utiliza as operações de gestão de dados que fornecem; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: VirtualMode is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and one of the following conditions exist: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize*> is greater than 0 and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> is not handled. -or- - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems*>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems*> contains items.
trans-unit.target: VirtualMode está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e existe uma das seguintes condições:- <> </> *> é maior que 0 e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> não é processado. -or- - <>*>, <>*>, or <>*> contains items.

trans-unit.target: - ou - - as edições efetuadas ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>

trans-unit.target: Substituições <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>
